chest.name: Push-up
chest.instructions: Start in plank position, lower chest to floor, push back up.

chest.name: Barbell Bench Press
chest.instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar to chest, press back up.

biceps.name: Dumbbell Curl
biceps.instructions: Hold dumbbells, curl upward, control back down.

abs.name: Plank
abs.instructions: Hold a push-up position with forearms on the ground.

abs.name: Crunch
abs.instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, lift shoulders off ground.

lats.name: Pull-up
lats.instructions: Hang from bar, pull body up until chin is above bar.

lats.name: Deadlift
lats.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bend at hips and knees to grasp barbell, lift by extending hips and knees to full stand.

triceps.name: Tricep Dip
triceps.instructions: Lower body by bending arms, push back up.

triceps.name: Tricep Pushdown
triceps.instructions: Push cable down by extending arms, control back up.
